abstract: Kenyan Pres Uhuru Kenyatta orders $100 million worth of ivory burned, largest amount of ivory destroyed at one time, emphasizing his stance on inhumane and illegal ivory trade.

headline.print_headline: Taking On Poachers, Kenya Burns Ivory
headline.main: Kenya Burns Elephant Ivory Worth $105 Million to Defy Poachers

snippet: It was the most ivory ever destroyed at one time, representing 6,000 to 7,000 dead elephants.
lead_paragraph: It was the most ivory ever destroyed at one time, representing 6,000 to 7,000 dead elephants.
